channel.title: Leftovers Notes on
channel.description: Recent content in Leftovers Notes on

item.title: Saltmarsh
item.description: Rich looking ship doing tavern crawl with announcement - lord solmer passed away - son anders taken over business, looking for crew of individuals to turn things around

item.title: Sunless Citadel
item.description: Rumor: town of ocursed (mid-summer) have a annual celebration, goblins sell strange fruit (50gp) - is a perfect apple that heals any disease or ailment.
